member.summary: Specifies available orientations of the OCR object on the image.

member.name: F:Vintasoft.Imaging.Ocr.Results.OcrObjectOrientation.PageUp
member.summary: Context (text) of OCR object is written on the image from bottom to top.

member.name: F:Vintasoft.Imaging.Ocr.Results.OcrObjectOrientation.PageRight
member.summary: Context (text) of OCR object is written on the image from left to right. Used for latin languages.

member.name: F:Vintasoft.Imaging.Ocr.Results.OcrObjectOrientation.PageDown
member.summary: Context (text) of OCR object is written on the image from top to bottom. Used for asian languages.

member.name: F:Vintasoft.Imaging.Ocr.Results.OcrObjectOrientation.PageLeft
member.summary: Context (text) of OCR object is written on the image from right to left.
